long_description: The Craghoppers Nosilife desert hat gives kids the protection and coverage they need from insects and solar rays. Insect Shield permethrin repellent remains effective for up to 70 washings and offers non-toxic protection from biting bugs. Legionnaire-style flap and brim provide full coverage from the sun; flap folds up and away when it's not needed. Moisture-controlling headband helps keep kids cool and dry. Elastic cord adjusts at the back to dial in the perfect fit.
short_description: The Craghoppers Nosilife desert hat gives kids the protection and coverage they need from insects and solar rays.
